title: Welcome Arbab Nasrullah
subtitle: Let's Make Tech Tangible
content: Hi! I'm Arbab Nasrullah. Today we'll explore how everyday input devices shape interaction, accessibility, and creativity. Expect short demos, hands-on tips, and a quick quiz at the end.
points: Quick background: who I am and what I build
What you'll learn: when to choose each input device
Interactive demos and Q&A get ready to try things
notes: Warm greeting; invite one quick show of hands about devices people use most. Mention interactive demo and quiz.

title: Input Devices and Their Uses
subtitle: A Modern Interactive Presentation
content: Welcome! Explore the world of input devices and how they shape our digital experiences.
notes: Start with an engaging greeting. Make eye contact with the audience. Explain that we'll cover various input devices used daily.

title: Introduction to Input Devices
content: Input devices are the bridges between humans and machines keyboards, mice, touchscreens, microphones, cameras and sensors translate real-world actions into digital commands.
points: What an input device does: senses, translates, transmits
Why choice matters: accuracy, speed, accessibility
Examples you'll see: typing, pointing, touch, voice, and sensors
notes: Give a concise definition with everyday examples. Mention why ergonomics and accessibility matter when choosing devices.

title: Importance of Input Devices
content: Input devices are essential for communication between humans and computers, enabling efficient data entry, control, and interaction.

title: Keyboard
content: A keyboard is a primary input device used to enter text, numbers, and commands into a computer.

title: Mouse
content: A mouse is a pointing device that detects two-dimensional motion, allowing users to interact with graphical elements.

title: Touchscreen
content: A touchscreen allows users to interact directly with what is displayed, using a finger or stylus.

title: Microphone
content: A microphone captures audio input, enabling voice commands, recording, and communication.
points: Use in speech recognition and streaming

title: Scanner
content: A scanner digitizes physical documents and images, converting them into electronic format.
points: OCR converts images to editable text
Used in archiving and document workflows

title: Webcam
content: A webcam captures video and images, commonly used for video conferencing and streaming.

title: Joystick / Game Controller
content: Joysticks and game controllers provide input for gaming and simulations, offering precise control.
points: Used in simulation, robotics, and gaming

title: Barcode Scanner
content: A barcode scanner reads printed barcodes, translating them into digital data for inventory and sales.
points: Integration with POS and inventory systems

title: Light Pen / Stylus
content: A light pen or stylus allows users to draw or select objects directly on a screen.
points: Tilt and angle detection in advanced pens
Pair with graphics tablet or touchscreen

title: Graphics Tablet
content: A graphics tablet enables artists and designers to create digital artwork with precision.

title: Fingerprint Scanner
content: A fingerprint scanner provides secure authentication by reading unique fingerprint patterns.
points: Integration in mobile devices and locks

title: Summary / Conclusion
content: Input devices are vital for digital interaction, each serving unique purposes in our daily lives.
points: Each device has strengths for specific tasks
Choose the right device for the user and task

title: Thank You!
subtitle: Questions?
content: Thank you for your attention! Feel free to ask any questions.
